Immer noch eines der besten Spiele aller Zeiten. Es gibt bis heute nichts wirklich vergleichbares. Die Story bietet in Kombination mit den hier im zweiten Teil nun ausgereiften Spielmechaniken ein Meisterwerk, welches jeder mal gespielt haben sollte.

Ich kann die beiden kostenlosen und eigenständigen Mods Portal Stories: Mel und Portal: Reloaded empfehlen, die sehr viel Spaß machen und qualitativ (nah) ans Original herankommen.

Сложная и весёлая игра, куча манипуляций с окружающим миром. Весело проходить кооперотив.

Jest to zdecydowanie najlepsza gra łamigłówkowa w jaką kiedykolwiek grałem. Ma bardzo ciekawą i wciągającą fabułę. Plusem na pewno jest też to, że oprócz trybu fabularnego w grze znajduje się również kooperacja. Stanowczo stwierdzam, że "Portal 2" jest bardzo dobrą grą dla fanów jak i dla nieznających jeszcze serii graczy.
好玩得很，内容很创新，再加上创意工坊那八十万张地图。。。。。可玩性几乎无限好吧（但是你得有点智商

Everything in the first Portal is doubled in the second, pun originally not intended but now it is, too bad. This game has everything that you'd want in a game where you solve puzzles but is still intense. The portal gun is endless fun. I personally am not a huge fan of the section with Cave Johnson (aside from him shouting at me, thats pretty funny), but I still love the concept of the speed and bounce gels. If you have not played Portal 1 or 2, definitely buy and play them. They are a must-play in the world of gaming.
esse jogo é bom porém a opção de achar alguem online demora demais e provavelmente foi abandonado

1.8 hours in: I've only played under 2 hours of this so far and so far I can say...wow. This game is amazing. I can't say a ton about difficulty and level design yet, but so far it's been great. Very interesting mechanics for starters, but you need good devs (not just good mechanics) to make a good game. But boy golly jeepers have the devs made some genius levels. The story in the single player is cool so far as well, very MISTEEREEOUS if you catch my drift. 

I don't believe "5/5" scores should be saved for only perfection, it's very hard to achieve perfection. I think if a game is truly perfect I would put it at like a 6 or something. But anyways, I give Portal 2 a 5/5.

Portal is the first game I ever played single player and I fell in love with it. I wasn't able to play Portal 2 for 5+ years after because I never had my own console or computer but once I did it was the first game I bought. I love it and always will.
Spoiler Alert:  This game is amazing

This is truly the greatest game ever it is so cheap for how worth it it is. its not one of those story games you play once and never again u actually have different accomplishments and things to do. The co-op mode is incredibly fun, that u can play with friends all around the world. i have a terrible laptop and i thought when i bought it  i wouldn't be able to run it but i was wrong i can run it perfectly. In conclusion this is a absolutely wonderful game that i recommend to you.

really good puzzle game

Great game! Been wanting to play this for 10+ years. After getting my hands on it, I was just as impressed playing it as I was watching everybody else play it! I love the scenery and subtle ambiance. The emersion was done very well, with the machinery noises in the distance and Wheatley occasionally making his presence known. I love the constant butting heads of me and Glados, and how much she stands her ground!

I love the game overall and I highly recommend it to anyone!
